title: Anacostia Park: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons      Anacostia Park is open daily during daylight hours. The park is closed on January 1, Thanksgiving, and December 25. The skating pavilion is open from Memorial Day through Labor Day. Weekday hours are 11:00 am to 5:45 pm. Weekend hours are 11:00 am to 6:45 pm.
